title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the District Court (Fees) (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the District Court (Fees) (Amendment) 

Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 23rd October 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited district court (fees) (amendment) order 2020 (2) order come operation 23rd october 2020

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. The District Court (Fees) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 22 of 2014) is amended
text_raw:
2. The District Court (Fees) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 22 of 2014) is amended 

by the insertion of the following Articles after Article 4– 

“4A. Notwithstanding Article 2, no fee shall be payable under this 
Order in the year 2020 in respect of the items specified in column (1) of 
Part 4 of the Schedule at the following reference numbers: 

(a) 4 (On an application for a certificate of transfer of a licence); 

(b) 8 (On an application for a General Exemption Order); 

(c) 

16a (On an application for a restaurant certificate or a limited 
restaurant certificate); 

(d) 18 (On an application for a certificate of registration of a 

club); 

(e) 

22 (On an application for any other public dancing licence); 

(f) 

23 (On an application for a music and singing licence). 

4B. Notwithstanding Article 2, no fee shall be payable under this 
Order in the year 2020 in respect of the item specified, at reference 
number 5 (On the issue of a certificate of renewal of a licence), in column 
(1) of Part 4 of the Schedule where the licence in respect of which the 
certificate of renewal is issued is a spirit retailer’s on-licence.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Order. 

[439] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 October, 2020. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 October, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [439]

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends the District Court (Fees) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 22 of 2014) in 
order to provide that no fee shall be payable in the year 2020 in respect of certain 
items. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [439] 5
